name: "Byakuya - Nearly Untouchable: Cute, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper"
effect: "When Byakuya enters play, discard him unless you discard a Senbonzakura or Senbonzakura Kageyoshi from your hand."

name: "Don Kan'onji - Karakura Leader: Good, Human, Male"
effect: "When Don Kan'onji enters play, search your deck for an item or event with ""Karakura"" in its text and put it in your hand."

name: "Ganju - Surprised: Good, Male, Spirit"
effect: Discard up to 3 Spirits from your hand: Ganju gets +1 to all stats this battle for each Spirit discarded by this effect. Limit once per turn.

name: "Ichigo - to the Rescue: Cute, Good, Male, Soul Reaper"
effect: Discard an Ichigo character of any version from your hand: Ichigo gets +2 to all stats this battle. Limit once per battle.

name: "Kenpachi - Recovering: Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper"
effect: You do not lose power from your opponent's effects while you have 1 or more other Squad 11 characters in your party.

name: "Kisuke - Chatting: Good, Human, Male"
effect: Discard Kisuke from play: Search your deck for an Animal and put it in your hand.

name: "Orihime - Apologetic: Cute, Female, Good, Spirit"
effect: "When Orihime enters play, you may search your deck for a different version of Orihime and put her in your hand."

name: "Rangiku - Thinking: Cute, Female, Soldier, Soul Reaper"
effect: "When Rangiku leaves play, your opponent loses 1 power and you gain 1 power."

name: "Renji - Bankai Training: Cute, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper"
effect: "When Renji enters play, search your deck for a Bankai that can attach to your Renji Abarai guardian and attach it for no cost."

name: "Rukia - Caring Sister: Cute, Female, Good, Soldier, Soul Reaper"
effect: Other Squad 13 characters in your party get +1 to all stats.

name: "Toshiro - Ready for Action: Cute, Male, Soldier, Soul Reaper"
effect: "When Toshiro enters play, name a trait. Toshiro renews when he wins a battle against a character with that trait."

name: "Uryu - Embarrassed: Cute, Good, Male, Quincy, Spirit"
effect: "When Uryu enters play, search your deck for an item with ""Uryu"" in the text and put it in your hand."

name: "Yachiru - Biting: Cute, Female, Soldier, Soul Reaper"
effect: (Yachiru costs -1 body energy for each body energy you played this turn if you have a Squad 11 character in your party)

name: "Yoruichi - Flash Master: Cute, Female, Good, Spirit"
effect: "(You may play Yoruichi anytime you could play an event.) When Yoruichi enters play, you may search your deck for 5 Spirits and discard them."

name: Byakuya Kuchiki
effect: "At the start of the game, you may put in play one spirit energy"

name: Ganryu
effect: Your Blank characters gain "Deplete: Put in play a Blank from your discard pile." *Evil Soul Reapers in your party gain +X to all stats. X=the number of Blank characters in your party.

name: Gin Ichimaru
effect: Your Squad 3, 5 and 9 characters belong to all 3 of these Squads.* When one of your Squad 3 characters enters play, you may return a character in your opponent's party that has an energy cost of 3 or less to its owner's hand.

name: Ichigo Kurosaki
effect: "At the start of the game, you may put in play one body energy"

name: Jin Kariya
effect: At the start of your turn, you may collect any cards in your discard pile or hand as Souls.*Bounts in your party cannot leave play from your opponent's effects while you have 10 or more Souls.

name: Kenpachi Zaraki
effect: You take a maximum of 2 power damage from characters with an energy cost of 2 or less

name: Kisuke Urahara
effect: Discard an item from your hand or remove from the game an item in your discard pile: Draw a card. Use only during your turn. Limit once per turn.

name: Kon
effect: When a character in your party is defeated, you may discard a Kon character from your hand instead of discarding the defeated character. Your Kon characters gain the Non-Unique trait.

name: Maki Ichinose
effect: Your Squad 11 characters gain the Evil trait.*Characters in your opponent's party with an energy cost of 4 or less get -1 to all stats for each Evil Soul Reaper in your party.

name: Orihime Inouye
effect: "When you play a Student, your opponent loses 1 power"

name: Renji Abarai
effect: "When you play a Soul Reaper, you may deplete it and discard a card from your hand to search your deck for an item with that character's name in its text and attach it to that character for no energy cost."

name: Retsu Unohana
effect: "Your Non-Unique Soul Reapers that don't belong to a Squad now belong to Squad 4. Your Squad 4 characters gain ""Defensive 2"""

name: Rukia Kuchiki
effect: Discard a card from your hand: Draw a card. Use only during your turn. Limit once per turn

name: Senna
effect: "Your Blank characters get +2 to all stats.*When one of your Blank characters leaves play, gain 1 power."

name: Shigekuni Genryusai Yamamoto
effect: "At the start of the game, choose Squad 3, 5, 6, or 11. Your Squad 1 characters belong to that Squad and vice-versa. Squad 1 characters in your party gain ""Defensive 3."""

name: Soi Fon
effect: "When one of your effects would discard any of your opponent's characters from play, remove them from the game instead. When you attack with a Squad 2 character, you may remove 2 cards in your opponent's discard pile from the game."

name: Sosuke Aizen
effect: At the start of the game, you may put in play one mind energy.

name: Toshiro Hitsugaya
effect: Any character in your party that has attacked 1 or more times this turn gets +1 to all stats during battle. When you attack with a characterthat has attacide 1 or more times this turn, gain 1 power.

name: Uryu Ishida
effect: "Once per game, you may shuffle your hand into your deck and draw the same number of cards"

name: Yoruichi Shihoin
effect: "Lose 1 power: put a renewed enenergy from your energy pile into your side deck. If you do, put an energy from your side deck into your energy pile."
